## Bio

Chris is the Manager of Data Analysis and Data Privacy at [TechSmith](https://www.techsmith.com), the makers of great software like Snagit and Camtasia. At TechSmith he works with stakeholders across the company on analytics and data science projects.

Chris is the author of several `R` packages hosted on CRAN:

-   [marketr](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/marketr/index.html)
-   [ibmAcousticR](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/ibmAcousticR/index.html)
-   [reveneraR](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/reveneraR/index.html)
-   [zdeskR](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/zdeskR/index.html)
-   [zoomr](https://github.com/chrisumphlett/zoomr)

Chris lives in East Lansing, MI with his wife and four young children.
